main.name: Muhammad Suleman
main.description: I create modern web experiences with Next.js and TypeScript
main.bio: Hi there! I am Muhammad Suleman, a passionate Frontend Developer and Software Engineer. With expertise in Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies, I focus on building scalable and high-performance web applications. My journey includes working on real-world projects, including e-commerce platforms, AI-powered applications, and dynamic web experiences. I aim to deliver user-centric, accessible, and well-optimized products. I continuously strive to learn and master new technologies, ensuring I stay at the forefront of web development.
main.contactmessage: Let's connect and build something amazing together!

education.description: Specialized in Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web frameworks.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Building scalable, accessible, and high-performance web applications using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

testimonials.text: Muhammad Suleman is an exceptional developer! His expertise in Next.js and TypeScript is impressive, and he always delivers high-quality work.
Working with Muhammad Suleman has been a great experience. His dedication to learning and building top-notch applications is inspiring.
